title: The Great Cola Challenge: Coke vs Pepsi - Kinda Munchies
description:
I put Nick, Andy and Kevin through a Blind soda taste test challenge... will they come up on top? 

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
